pages.privacy-policy: DoorWise Privacy Policy - Your Security Matters to Us Mon-Friday 9am - 5pm +91-977-0505013 doorwise@gmail.com DoorWise Home Services Why are we Our advantages Our priority Our Promise Privacy Policy First and foremost, we want to emphasize that all the content on our website, including text, images, and graphics, is owned by DoorWise and is protected by copyright laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any of our content without our express written consent. Our website is intended for personal, non-commercial use only. You may browse our products, read our blog, and contact us for more information, but you may not use our website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. We reserve the right to terminate your access to our website at any time, without notice, if we believe that you have violated any of our terms and conditions. Product Descriptions and Availability We strive to provide accurate and complete descriptions of all our products. However, we cannot guarantee that the information on our website is error-free. We reserve the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies, or omissions at any time, without notice. All our products are subject to availability. We will do our best to keep our website up-to-date with the latest information about our inventory, but we cannot guarantee that all products will be in stock at all times. If a product is not available, we will contact you to offer a substitute or to discuss other options. Pricing and Payment All prices on our website are in US dollars and are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to correct any pricing errors that may occur. We accept various forms of payment, including credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. All payments are processed through a secure payment gateway to ensure the safety and confidentiality of your information. Shipping and Delivery We offer free shipping on all orders within the contiguous United States. We will ship your order within 2-3 business days of receiving your payment. Delivery times may vary depending on your location and the availability of the product. We are not responsible for any delays or damages that may occur during shipping. If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us immediately so that we can arrange for a replacement or a refund. Returns and Refunds We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not happy with your product, you may return it within 30 days of receipt for a full refund or exchange. The product must be in its original condition, with all tags and packaging intact. To initiate a return, please contact us at doorwise@gmail.com. We will provide you with a return authorization number and instructions on how to ship the product back to us. Limitation of Liability In no event shall DoorWise be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our website or the purchase of our products. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the product. Governing Law and Jurisdiction This disclaimer and all disputes arising out of or in connection with it shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to this disclaimer shall be instituted exclusively in the federal or state courts located in the State of California. Quality and Craftsmanship At DoorWise, we take pride in the quality and craftsmanship of our interior doors. All our doors are made from the finest materials, including solid wood, engineered wood, and glass, and are constructed with precision and attention to detail. We use only the best hardware and accessories to ensure that our doors are not only beautiful but also functional and durable. Our doors are designed to meet the highest standards of performance and safety. They are tested for strength, durability, and resistance to wear and tear. They are also designed to meet or exceed all applicable building codes and regulations. Design and Style We offer a wide range of interior door designs and styles to suit any taste and decor. From traditional to contemporary, our doors are available in a variety of finishes, colors, and textures to complement your home's architecture and interior design. Our doors can be customized to fit your specific needs and preferences. We offer a variety of options, including size, shape, and hardware, to create a door that is truly unique and personalized. Installation and Maintenance Our doors are easy to install and maintain. We provide detailed installation instructions and all the necessary hardware and accessories to ensure a smooth and hassle-free installation process. Our doors are also designed for easy maintenance, with features such as removable hinges and adjustable thresholds. To keep your door looking its best, we recommend regular cleaning and maintenance. Use a soft cloth and mild detergent to clean the door and hardware. Avoid using abrasive cleaners or chemicals that may damage the finish. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this disclaimer or any of our products, please do not hesitate to contact us at doorwise@gmail.com. We are always happy to help. Thank you for choosing DoorWise for all your interior door needs. We look forward to serving you! DoorWise Open the door to quality and style with DoorWise. pages.terms-conditions: DoorWise Terms of Use - Understanding Our Guidelines Mon-Friday 9am - 5pm +91-977-0505013 doorwise@gmail.com DoorWise Home Services Why are we Our advantages Our priority Our Promise Terms of Use Use of Website DoorWise provides this website as a service to our customers. We will make every effort to deliver your order within the estimated time frame, but delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances.
